content.question: In the context of the entire poem, it is clear that "if ever" (line 1) expresses the speaker's

choices.label: inability to understand his friend's behavior
desire that his friend should never turn against him
failure to live up to his friend's ideals
assumption that he will prove worthy of his friend's trust

content.answer: desire that his friend should never turn against him

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
